title: Podcast and Music Players
content:
NPR

  • Podcast and text news are listed seamlessly
  • “Open Podcast App” CTA
  • Sort podcast by Program or Station
  • No sticky player (Dedicated page for a currently playing content. It is accessible by forward button in the header)
  • Live / On Demand indications
  • Seamlessly plays in native player

NEW YORK TIMES

  • Customized card in the main feed that opens Podcast App (Almost as if it was an advertisement)
  • CON: Podcast cannot be played in the app. (Only available in the website)
  • CON: There is no curation of podcast in the app.
  • CON: User has to actively look for New York Times Channel in the podcast app. (It does not deep-link to the New York Times Channel page in the podcast app.
  • CON: (WEB) When user navigates to different web page, it stops the podcast.
  • CON: (WEB) The preview of the podcast in the native OS player is not informative.

GUARDIAN

  • Dedicated section for podcast and easy to browse
  • Stories (or descriptions) and related podcasts
  • CON: No fixed player in the app (it does not play natively either), so once a user leaves the page, the user loses control on the podcast.
  • CON: It does not play natively, so once user leaves the app or locks the screen, the podcast stops.

BeyondPod (1 million > android users)

  • Latest podcasts are listed in the main feed.
  • Channel list on left hand drawer.
  • Playlist (Favorites) on right hand drawer.
  • Mixture of audio and video podcast.
  • Option to pre-download
  • x1.0, x1.5, x2.0 speeds (as well as custom speed with sliders)
  • -10 sec backward, +30 sec forward
  • Large interface (Driving Mode)
  • Sleep Timer
  • CON: Horizontal scroll navigation to browse the playlist, when users are listening to podcast. It takes extra time to browse.

SPOTIFY

  • Discover channels by categorized H-scrolls.
  • Seamlessly plays in native player.
  • -15sec backward, +15 sec forward
  • Download file (automatically follow channels)

SoundCloud

  • Search and Trending are main sources for discovering
  • Seamlessly plays in native OS player
  • Easy and devoted navigation UI
